Package com.jme3.bullet.collision

Class AfMode

java.lang.Object
com.jme3.bullet.collision.AfMode
public class AfMode
extends java.lang.Object
Named anisotropic friction modes for use with a PhysicsCollisionObject.
See Also:
PhysicsCollisionObject.hasAnisotropicFriction(int), PhysicsCollisionObject.setAnisotropicFriction(com.jme3.math.Vector3f, int)
